name: s3://eodata/CLMS/bio-geophysical/vegetation_properties/fcover_global_300m_10daily_v2
browserSearchPath: CLMS Bio-geophysical Parameters, Vegetation, Vegetation Properties
collectionDescription: Provides information of the fraction of ground covered by green vegetation. Every 10-days estimates are available at global scale in the spatial resolution of ~ 300 m from January 2014 to the present. More information here.

layers.longDescription: FCOVER is defined as the fraction of ground surface covered by green vegetation as seen from the nadir direction.

layers.shortDescription: Root Mean Square Error on FCOVER
layers.longDescription: RMSE is computed between the final dekadal FCOVER value and the available valid instantaneous values in the compositing window.

layers.shortDescription: Number of available valid instantaneous FCOVER
layers.longDescription: Number of available valid instantaneous FCOVER values in the compositing window.

layers.shortDescription: Length of the semi-period before the date [days]
layers.longDescription: Length of the semi-period before the dekadal date of the compositing window [days].

layers.shortDescription: Length of the semi-period after the date [days]
layers.longDescription: Length of the semi-period after the dekadal date of the compositing window [days].
